metadata.title: CVE-2020-15945 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Lua through 5.4.0 has a segmentation fault in changedline in ldebug.c(e.g., when called by luaG_traceexec) because it incorrectly expects thatan oldpc value is always updated upon a return of the flow of control to afunction.

criterions.comment: lua50: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
